channel.title: Minecraft on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Minecraft on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Minecaft Redstone Handbook
item.description:
I have had this book for a long time, and it is showing wear. Unfortunately I have the paperback version of the book, so it is extra fragile. I found it pressed against a metal lock, so I was surprised when I found it in surprisingly good condition.

None-the-less, these books are extremely valuable to me; they used to be like gold in elementary school, and having the full collection made you the coolest kid in the school.

item.title: Minecraft Beginner's Handbook
item.description:
I got the book used for 6-something (Though the sticker on the front says $7.89). I was shocked at how low the price was and the book is in pristine condition, besides from a dent on the spine.

Strangely enough, this is an English copy from Egmont. The website is down, which is kind of funny. This one seems to work, though. All of my other Minecraft handbooks are Schoolastic.

This is a hardback copy, same as the [[Minecraft Construction Handbook]].

item.title: Minecraft Combat Handbook
item.description:
I have had this book for a long time, and it is showing wear. Unfortunately I have the paperback version of the book, so it is extra fragile.

None-the-less, these books are extremely valuable to me; they used to be like gold in elementary school, and having the full collection made you the coolest kid in the school.

item.title: Minecraft Construction Handbook
item.description:
I have had this book for a long time, and it is showing wear. I do have the hardcover edition of this book, so it is in much better condition than the Combat Handbook, however it is scratched up and has a stain on the back.

None-the-less, these books are extremely valuable to me; they used to be like gold in elementary school, and having the full collection made you the coolest kid in the school.

item.title: Minecraft Guide to Redstone
item.description: There is a mug stain in the dead center of the title.
